Sentencas: Liquid hydrocarbons (LC) are considered as fuel cells feed and, more particularly, as solid oxide fuel cell feed.
Titulo: Diesel steam reforming with a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: Cost-effective LC-reforming catalysts are critically needed for the successful commercialization of such technologies.
Titulo: Diesel steam reforming with a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: An alternative to noble metal catalysts, proposed by the authors in a previous publication, has been proven efficient for diesel steam reforming (SR).
Titulo: Diesel steam reforming with a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: Nickel, less expensive and more readily available than noble metals, was used in a form that prevents deactivation.
Titulo: Diesel steam reforming with a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The catalyst formulation is a Ni-alumina spinel (NiAl(2)O(4)) supported on alumina (Al(2)O(3)) and yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ).
Titulo: Diesel steam reforming with a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: SR of commercial diesel was undertaken for more than 15h at high gas hourly space velocities and steam-to-carbon ratios lower than 2.
Titulo: Diesel steam reforming with a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: Constant diesel conversion and high hydrogen concentrations were obtained.
Titulo: Diesel steam reforming with a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: Ni catalyst characterization revealed no detectable amounts of carbon on the spinet catalyst surface Ni.
Titulo: Diesel steam reforming with a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: The effect of catalyst composition (Ni concentration and YSZ presence) was studied to understand and optimize the developed catalyst.
Titulo: Diesel steam reforming with a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst for solid oxide fuel cell application

Sentencas: Two phenomena were found to be influenced by relative catalyst composition: water-gas-shift vs reforming reaction extent, and concentration of light hydrocarbons in products.
Titulo: Diesel steam reforming with a nickel-alumina spinel catalyst for solid oxide fuel cell application
